history.proof: induction A. - simpl. apply incl_nil. - simpl. destruct (p a) eqn:E. + apply incl_tran with (a :: A). * apply incl_lcons. auto. * apply incl_shift. apply incl_refl. + intros H. shelve.

In environment X : Type p : X -> bool a : X A : list X IHA : filter p A <<= A E : p a = true Unable to unify "filter p A <<= A" with "a :: filter p A <<= a :: A".
[Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
p: X -> bool
A: list X

Goal:
filter p A <<= A

Premises:
filter : forall A : Type, (A -> bool) -> list A -> list A
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
list_exists_DM : forall (X : Type) (A : list X) (p : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> ~ (forall x : X, x el A -> ~ p x) -> exists x : X, x el A /\ p x
incl_map : forall (X Y : Type) (A B : list X) (f : X -> Y), A <<= B -> map f A <<= map f B
in_filter_iff : forall x p A, x el filter p A < -> x el A /\ p x
incl_filter : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l <<= l
equi : forall X : Type, list X -> list X -> Prop
disjoint : forall X : Type, list X -> list X -> Prop
filter_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l' : list A), filter f (l ++ l') = filter f l ++ filter f l'
Tauto.clause = fun Term' Annot : Type => list (Term' * Annot) : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments Tauto.clause (_ _)%type_scope
Tauto.cnf = fun Term' Annot : Type => list (Tauto.clause Term' Annot) : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments Tauto.cnf (_ _)%type_scope
ext_in_filter : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l -> forall a : A, a el l -> f a = g a
filter_ext_in : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), (forall a : A, a el l -> f a = g a) -> filter f l = filter g l
filter_ext : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, filter f l = filter g l
filter_ext_in_iff : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l < -> (forall a : A, a el l -> f a = g a)
filter_map : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l < -> map f l = map g l
incl_rcons : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), A <<= x :: B -> ~ x el A -> A <<= B
concat_filter_map : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list (list A)), concat (map (filter f) l) = filter f (concat l)
incl_lrcons : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), x :: A <<= x :: B -> ~ x el A -> A <<= B
incl_app_left : forall (X : Type) (A B C : list X), A ++ B <<= C -> A <<= C /\ B <<= C
dec_DN : forall X : Prop, dec X -> ~ ~ X -> X
incl_shift : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), A <<= B -> x :: A <<= x :: B
filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l : list A), x el filter f l < -> x el l /\ f x = true
incl_nil_eq : forall (X : Type) (A : list X), A <<= [] -> A = []
disjoint_incl : forall (X : Type) (A B B' : list X), B' <<= B -> disjoint A B -> disjoint A B'
List.incl_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list A), l1 <<= l2 -> map f l1 <<= map f l2
incl_sing : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A : list X) (y : X), x :: A <<= [y] -> x = y /\ A <<= [y]
Ring_polynom.Pol_ind : forall (C : Type) (P : Ring_polynom.Pol C -> Prop), (forall c : C, P (Ring_polynom.Pc c)) -> (forall (p : positive) (p0 : Ring_polynom.Pol C), P p0 -> P (Ring_polynom.Pinj p p0)) -> (forall p : Ring_polynom.Pol C, P p -> forall (p0 : positive) (p1 : Ring_polynom.Pol C), P p1 -> P (Ring_polynom.PX p p0 p1)) -> forall p : Ring_polynom.Pol C, P p
incl_Forall : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), l2 <<= l1 -> Forall P l1 -> Forall P l2
incl_Exists : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l1 l2 : list A), l1 <<= l2 -> Exists P l1 -> Exists P l2
not_dec : forall X : Prop, dec X -> dec (~ X)
list_in_dec : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A : list X), eq_dec X -> dec (x el A)
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.I {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope
list_exists_not_incl : forall (X : eqType) (A B : list X), ~ A <<= B -> exists x : X, x el A /\ ~ x el B
incl_tran : forall (A : Type) (l m n : list A), l <<= m -> m <<= n -> l <<= n
incl_app : forall (A : Type) (l m n : list A), l <<= n -> m <<= n -> l ++ m <<= n
Field_theory.AFdiv_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Field_theory.almost_field_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv req -> forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q))
incl_app_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 m1 m2 : list A), l1 <<= m1 -> l2 <<= m2 -> l1 ++ l2 <<= m1 ++ m2
partition : forall A : Type, (A -> bool) -> list A -> list A * list A
Record almost_field_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_afield { AF_AR : Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req; AF_1_neq_0 : ~ req rI rO; AFdiv_def : forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q)); AFinv_l : forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI } Arguments Field_theory.almost_field_theory [R]%type_scope _ _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments Field_theory.mk_afield [R]%type_scope [rO rI] [radd rmul rsub ropp]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [req]%function_scope _ _ (_ _)%function_scope
NoDup_length_incl : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), NoDup l -> | l' | <= | l | -> l <<= l' -> l' <<= l
incl_lcons : forall (X : Type) (x : X) (A B : list X), x :: A <<= B < -> x el B /\ A <<= B

```  
intros X p A.
induction A.
- simpl. apply incl_nil.
- simpl. destruct (p a) eqn:E.
  + apply incl_rcons. apply IHA. apply incl_tran with (a :: A).
    * apply incl_lcons. auto.
    * apply incl_shift. apply incl_refl.
    * intros H. inversion H.
  + apply incl_tran with A.
    * apply IHA. intros x [H1 H2]. apply H2. apply incl_tran with (a :: A).
      ++ apply incl_lcons. auto.
      ++ apply incl_shift. apply incl_refl.
    * apply incl_shift. apply incl_refl.
```

original: intros X p A. induction A. - simpl. apply incl_nil. - simpl. destruct (p a) eqn:E. + apply incl_rcons. apply IHA. apply incl_tran with (a :: A). * apply incl_lcons. auto. * apply incl_shift. apply incl_refl. * intros H. inversion H. + apply incl_tran with A. * apply IHA. intros x [H1 H2]. apply H2. apply incl_tran with (a :: A). ++ apply incl_lcons. auto. ++ apply incl_shift. apply incl_refl. * apply incl_shift. apply incl_refl.
